name: The minimal Dungeon Experience
description:
This project is designed as an action exploration game with battle and character advancement, dungeon crawling style, puzzles and traps and many other cool stuff. Unfortunately because this jam's theme is minimalism, we have implemented the very minimum of the features... and levels... and everything. 

Please enjoy and comment a lot, we're happy to hear your opinion ^^

Of course our game has NO BUGS! But if you think you found one - share with us, so that we can tell you it's not and explain how this is a feature and absolutely NOT A BUG!!!!!

PS All rumors that this game is incomplete for the reasons of time shortage and lack of personnel is a cruel work of our enemies!!!!1111 

I plan to improve the game after the jam has ended and add all the features that were planned: Including cutscenes and simple story, character advancement, challenges and puzzles along the way, secrets, advanced enemies and bosses, abilities for both character and enemies and more.
